title: Ring doughnuts
description: There’s little else as tempting as a fresh batch of homemade doughnuts, especially topped with a zingy thick lemon icing.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 8cm/3¼in straight sided round cutter and a 2cm/¾in cutter.
ingredients: 250g/9oz strong white flour, plus extra for flouring
sunflower oil, for deep fat frying
